1660                                                                        r = r +(betm * a[i][j] - alfm * b[i][j]) * b[j][en];
1661                                                                }       // L610
1662
1663                                                                if (i == 0 || isw == 2) {
1664                                                                        stateB = StateB.B630;
1665                                                                        break;
1666                                                                }
1667                                                                if (betm * a[i][i - 1] == 0.0) {
1668                                                                        stateB = StateB.B630;
1669                                                                        break;
1670                                                                }
1671                                                                zz = w;
1672                                                                s = r;
1673                                                                stateB = StateB.B690;
1674                                                                break;
1675
1676                                                        case B630 :
1677                                                                m = i;
1678                                                                if (isw == 2) {
1679                                                                        stateB = StateB.B640;
1680                                                                        break;
1681                                                                }
1682                                                                // real 1-by-1 block
1683                                                                t = w;
1684                                                                if (w == 0.0) {
1685                                                                        t = epsb;
1686                                                                }
1687                                                                b[i][en] = -r / t;
1688                                                                stateB = StateB.B700;
1689                                                                break;
1690
1691                                                        case B640 :
1692                                                                // real 2-by-2 block
1693                                                                x = betm * a[i][i + 1] - alfm * b[i][i + 1];
1694                                                                y = betm * a[i + 1][i];
1695                                                                q = w * zz - x * y;
1696                                                                t = (x * s - zz * r) / q;
1697                                                                b[i][en] = t;
1698                                                                if (Math.abs(x) <= Math.abs(zz)) {
1699                                                                        stateB = StateB.B650;
1700                                                                        break;
1701                                                                }
1702                                                                b[i + 1][en] = (-r - w * t) / x;
1703                                                                stateB = StateB.B690;
1704                                                                break;
1705
1706                                                        case B650 :
1707                                                                b[i + 1][en] = (-s - y * t) / zz;
1708                                                                stateB = StateB.B690;
1709                                                                break;
1710
1711                                                        case B690 :
1712                                                                isw = 3 - isw;
1713                                                                stateB = StateB.B700;
1714                                                                break;
1715
1716                                                        case B700 :
1717                                                                stateB = StateB.Bfinal;
1718                                                                break;
1719
1720                                                        case Bfinal :
1721                                                                throw new RuntimeException("this should never happen!");
1722
1723                                                        }       // end switch (stateB)  
1724                                                }       // end StateLoopB                       
1725                                        }       // L700: end of LoopB
1726                                        if (VERBOSE) System.out.println("QZVEC: finished Loop B ***********************");
1727                                        // end real vector
1728                                        stateA = StateA.A800;
1729                                        break;
1730
1731                                case A710:
1732                                        // complex vector
1733                                        m = na;
1734                                        almr = alfr[m];
1735                                        almi = alfi[m];
1736                                        betm = beta[m];
1737                                        // last vector component chosen imaginary so that eigenvector matrix is triangular
1738                                        y = betm * a[en][na];
1739                                        b[na][na] = -almi * b[en][en] / y;
1740                                        b[na][en] = (almr * b[en][en] - betm * a[en][en]) / y;
1741                                        b[en][na] = 0.0;
1742                                        b[en][en] = 1.0;
1743                                        enm2 = na;                      // TODO: check!
1744                                        if (enm2 == 0) {
1745                                                stateA = StateA.A795;
1746                                                break;
1747                                        }
1748
1749                                        if (VERBOSE) System.out.println("QZVEC: starting Loop C, enm2 = " + enm2);
1750                                        LoopC: for (ii = 0; ii < enm2; ii++) {
1751                                                if (VERBOSE) System.out.println("    ii = " + ii);
1752                                                StateC stateC = StateC.Cinit;
1753                                                StateLoopC: while (stateC != StateC.Cfinal) {
1754                                                        if (VERBOSE) System.out.println("       StateLoopC: " + stateC);
1755                                                        switch (stateC) {
1756                                                        
1757                                                        case Cinit :
1758                                                                i = na - ii - 1;
1759                                                                w = betm * a[i][i] - almr * b[i][i];
1760                                                                w1 = -almi * b[i][i];
1761                                                                ra = 0.0;
1762                                                                sa = 0.0;
1763
1764                                                                for (j = m; j <= en; j++)
1765                                                                {
1766                                                                        x = betm * a[i][j] - almr * b[i][j];
1767                                                                        x1 = -almi * b[i][j];
1768                                                                        ra = ra + x * b[j][na] - x1 * b[j][en];
1769                                                                        sa = sa + x * b[j][en] + x1 * b[j][na];
1770                                                                }       // L760
1771
1772                                                                if (i == 0 || isw == 2) {
1773                                                                        stateC = StateC.C770;
1774                                                                        break;
1775                                                                }
1776                                                                if (betm * a[i][i - 1] == 0.0) {
1777                                                                        stateC = StateC.C770;
1778                                                                        break;
1779                                                                }
1780                                                                zz = w;
1781                                                                z1 = w1;
1782                                                                r = ra;
1783                                                                s = sa;
1784                                                                isw = 2;
1785                                                                stateC = StateC.C790;
1786                                                                break;
1787
1788                                                        case C770 :
1789                                                                m = i;
1790                                                                if (isw == 2) {
1791                                                                        stateC = StateC.C780;
1792                                                                        break;
1793                                                                }
1794                                                                // complex 1-by-1 block 
1795                                                                tr = -ra;
1796                                                                ti = -sa;
1797                                                                stateC = StateC.C773;
1798                                                                break;
1799
1800                                                        case C773:
1801                                                                dr = w;
1802                                                                di = w1;
1803                                                                stateC = StateC.C775;
1804                                                                break;
1805
1806                                                        case C775:
1807                                                                // complex divide (t1,t2) = (tr,ti) / (dr,di)
1808                                                                if (Math.abs(di) > Math.abs(dr)) {
1809                                                                        stateC = StateC.C777;
1810                                                                        break;
1811                                                                }                                                       
1812                                                                rr = di / dr;
1813                                                                d = dr + di * rr;
1814                                                                t1 = (tr + ti * rr) / d;
1815                                                                t2 = (ti - tr * rr) / d;
1816
1817                                                                switch (isw) {  // go to (787,782), isw
1818                                                                case 1: 
1819                                                                        stateC = StateC.C787;
1820                                                                        continue StateLoopC;
1821                                                                        //break;
1822                                                                case 2:
1823                                                                        stateC = StateC.C782;
1824                                                                        continue StateLoopC;
1825                                                                        //break;
1826                                                                default: 
1827                                                                        throw new RuntimeException("illegal state isw = " + isw);
1828                                                                }
1829                                                                //stateC = StateC.C777;
1830                                                                //break;
1831
1832                                                        case C777:
1833                                                                rr = dr / di;
1834                                                                d = dr * rr + di;
1835                                                                t1 = (tr * rr + ti) / d;
1836                                                                t2 = (ti * rr - tr) / d;
1837                                                                switch (isw) {  // go to (787,782), isw
1838                                                                case 1: 
1839                                                                        stateC = StateC.C787;
1840                                                                        continue StateLoopC;
1841                                                                        //break;
1842                                                                case 2: 
1843                                                                        stateC = StateC.C782;
1844                                                                        continue StateLoopC;
1845                                                                        //break;
1846                                                                default: 
1847                                                                        throw new RuntimeException("illegal state isw = " + isw);
1848                                                                }
1849                                                                //stateC = StateC.C780;
1850                                                                //break;
1851
1852                                                        case C780:
1853                                                                // complex 2-by-2 block 
1854                                                                x = betm * a[i][i + 1] - almr * b[i][i + 1];
1855                                                                x1 = -almi * b[i][i + 1];
1856                                                                y = betm * a[i + 1][i];
1857                                                                tr = y * ra - w * r + w1 * s;
1858                                                                ti = y * sa - w * s - w1 * r;
1859                                                                dr = w * zz - w1 * z1 - x * y;
1860                                                                di = w * z1 + w1 * zz - x1 * y;
1861                                                                if (dr == 0.0 && di == 0.0) {
1862                                                                        dr = epsb;
1863                                                                }
1864                                                                stateC = StateC.C775;
1865                                                                break;
1866
1867                                                        case C782:
1868                                                                b[i + 1][na] = t1;
1869                                                                b[i + 1][en] = t2;
1870                                                                isw = 1;
1871                                                                if (Math.abs(y) > Math.abs(w) + Math.abs(w1)) {
1872                                                                        stateC = StateC.C785;
1873                                                                        break;
1874                                                                }
1875                                                                tr = -ra - x * b[(i + 1)][na] + x1 * b[(i + 1)][en];
1876                                                                ti = -sa - x * b[(i + 1)][en] - x1 * b[(i + 1)][na];
1877                                                                stateC = StateC.C773;
1878                                                                break;
1879
1880                                                        case C785:
1881                                                                t1 = (-r - zz * b[(i + 1)][na] + z1 * b[(i + 1)][en]) / y;
1882                                                                t2 = (-s - zz * b[(i + 1)][en] - z1 * b[(i + 1)][na]) / y;
1883                                                                stateC = StateC.C787;
1884                                                                break;
1885
1886                                                        case C787:
1887                                                                b[i][na] = t1;
1888                                                                b[i][en] = t2;
1889                                                                stateC = StateC.C790;
1890                                                                break;
1891
1892                                                        case C790:
1893                                                                stateC = StateC.Cfinal;
1894                                                                break;
1895
1896                                                        case Cfinal:
1897                                                                throw new RuntimeException("this should never happen!");
1898
1899                                                        }       // end switch(stateC)
1900                                                }       // end StateLoopC
1901
1902                                        }       // L790: end of LoopC:
1903
1904                                        if (VERBOSE) System.out.println("QZVEC: finished Loop C ***********************");
1905                                        stateA = StateA.A795;
1906                                        break;
1907                                        // end complex vector
1908
1909                                case A795:
1910                                        isw = 3 - isw;
1911                                        stateA = StateA.A800;
1912                                        break;
1913
1914                                case A800:
1915                                        stateA = StateA.Afinal;
1916                                        break;
1917                                        
1918                                case Afinal:
1919                                        throw new RuntimeException("this should never happen!");
1920                                }       // end switch(stateA)
1921
1922                        }       // end StateLoopA 
1923                }       // L800: end LoopA
1924                if (VERBOSE) System.out.println("QZVEC: finished Loop A ***********************");
1925
1926                // end back substitution. transform to original coordinate system.
1927                for (jj = 0; jj < n; jj++) {
1928                        j = n - jj - 1;
1929
1930                        for (i = 0; i < n; i++) {
1931                                zz = 0.0;
1932                                for (k = 0; k <= j; k++) {
1933                                        zz = zz + z[i][k] * b[k][j];
1934                                }       // L860
1935                                z[i][j] = zz;
1936                        }
1937                }       // L880: end for (jj ...
1938
1939                if (VERBOSE) System.out.println("QZVEC: starting Loop D ***********************");
1940                // normalize so that modulus of largest component of each vector is 1.
1941                // (isw is 1 initially from before)
1942                LoopD: for (j = 0; j < n; j++) {
1943                        
1944                        StateD stateD = StateD.Dinit;
1945                        StateLoopD: while (stateD != StateD.Dfinal) {
1946
1947                                switch (stateD) {
1948                                case Dinit :
1949                                        d = 0.0;
1950                                        if (isw == 2) {
1951                                                stateD = StateD.D920;
1952                                                break;
1953                                        }
1954                                        if (alfi[j] != 0.0) {
1955                                                stateD = StateD.D945;
1956                                                break;
1957                                        }
1958
1959                                        for (i = 0; i < n; i++) {
1960                                                //      if ((Math.abs(z[i][j])) > d) d = (Math.abs(z[i][j]));
1961                                                d = Math.max(d, Math.abs(z[i][j]));
1962                                        } // L890
1963
1964                                        for (i = 0; i < n; i++) {
1965                                                z[i][j] = z[i][j] / d;
1966                                        }       // L900
1967
1968                                        stateD = StateD.D950;
1969                                        break;
1970
1971                                case D920:
1972                                        for (i = 0; i < n; i++) {
1973                                                r = Math.abs(z[i][j - 1]) + Math.abs(z[i][j]);
1974                                                if (r != 0.0) {
1975                                                        // r = r * dsqrt((z(i,j-1)/r)**2 + (z(i,j)/r)**2)
1976                                                        r = r * Math.hypot(z[i][j - 1] / r, z[i][j] / r);
1977                                                }
1978                                                if (r > d) {
1979                                                        d = r;
1980                                                }
1981                                        }       // L930
1982
1983                                        for (i = 0; i < n; i++) {
1984                                                z[i][j - 1] = z[i][j - 1] / d;
1985                                                z[i][j] = z[i][j] / d;
1986                                        }       // L940
1987
1988                                        stateD = StateD.D945;
1989                                        break;
1990
1991                                case D945:
1992                                        isw = 3 - isw;
1993                                        stateD = StateD.D950;
1994                                        break;
1995
1996                                case D950:
1997                                        stateD = StateD.Dfinal;
1998                                        break;
1999
2000                                case Dfinal:
2001                                        throw new RuntimeException("this should never happen!");
2002
2003                                }       // end switch(stateD)
2004                        }       // end StateLoopD
2005
2006                }       // L950: end LoopD
2007                if (VERBOSE) System.out.println("QZVEC: finished Loop D ***********************");
2008
2009        }       // end of qzvec()
2010
2011
2012        private enum StateA {
2013                Ainit, Afinal, A795, A710, A800
2014        }
2015
2016        private enum StateB {
2017                Binit, Bfinal, B630, B690, B640, B700, B650
2018        }
2019
2020        private enum StateC {
2021                Cinit, Cfinal, C770, C790, C780, C773, C775, C777, C787, C782, C785
2022        }
2023
2024        private enum StateD {
2025                Dinit, Dfinal, D920, D945, D950
2026        }
2027
2028}
